text: The Jonas Brothers are an American pop band from Wyckoff, New Jersey. It is made up of three brothers: Kevin Jonas, Joe, and Nick. The group was formed in 2005. They released four albums before disbanding: It's About Time in 2006, Jonas Brothers in 2007, A Little Bit Longer in 2008, and Lines, Vines and Trying Times in 2009. The band reunited in 2019, releasing the song "Sucker" as the lead single from their new album, Happiness Begins. Happiness Begins entered at number one on the Billboard 200. "Sucker" became their first chart- topper. == Albums == * It's About Time (2006) * Jonas Brothers (2007) * A Little Bit Longer (2008) * Lines, Vines and Trying Times (2009) * Happiness Begins (2019) * The Album (2023) ==References== == Other websites == * Official site * RIAA Certification Database Category:2005 establishments in the United States Category:2013 disestablishments in the United States Category:American boy bands Category:American Evangelicals Category:American pop rock bands Category:American television personalities Category:MTV Video Music Award winners Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2013 Category:Musical groups established in 2005 Category:2019 establishments Category:Musical groups from New Jersey Category:Musical trios
title: Jonas Brothers
